text: Absolutely no child should ever have to go hungry. Do you agree?
No child should ever go hungry
Our children are our future. We have to look out for them.
We have to educate them to make them even better than the last generation.
Did you know that In 2017 alone, Save the Children reached more than 155 million children in 120 countries, including the U.S.?
No, but that is amazing!
They do so much--from providing food, to making sure children are educated, to providing health and nutrition programs for children.
Please tell me more about this charity
They not only do so much to help children, they are also very savvy about how they spend donations. In fiscal year 2017, 86% of all expenditures went to program services
How much money did they make in 2017?
I don't have the exact figures, but 34 percent of what they raised went to health and nutrition. I think that is so critical, meeting basic needs, don't you?
Yes I believe that everyone should be fed nutritious meals and taken care of.
And what is really neat is that you can actually sponsor a child and really feel like you are making a difference. You actually know how you are helping!
That is really great to know where the money is going!
You sound like a very generous and caring person!
Thank you I try to be!
So, you can really make a difference. You can donate some of your money from the task payment. You can choose any amount from 0 to all your payment of 2 dollars. Any little bit would help.
I am choosing to donate $0.01
Could you donate a little bit more, say 25 cents? It would make such a difference to a child.
No I am sorry. I am choosing to donate $0.01
